item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ This site was more of challenge to build than I had initially thought, but I managed to get it running. It utilizes a static site generator Hugo and a theme of your choosing to get started and modify. The challenge was getting GitHub Pages to serve the site even though the documentation made it seem simple enough. As it turns out, the public directory Hugo generates with hugo -D, which contains the necessary index.
